title: Anti-Frizz & Smoothing Cream Humidity Resistant Hair Control, Silky Shine, Frizz-Free Locks, Nourishing, Long-Lasting, Salon-Quality, Lightweight, Non-Greasy, Manageable Tresses, UV Protection 200 mL
features: Deep conditioning & frizz-free control: Experience silky, smooth tresses with this nourishing mask, designed to provide long-lasting, salon-quality results for all hair types while eliminating frizz.
Restores moisture & manageability: Lock in hydration with this nutrient-rich, botanical-infused formula that detangles, reduces breakage, and promotes more manageable, easy-to-style locks.

Strengthens & enhances elasticity: This revitalizing, paraben-free, vegan, cruelty-free mask fortifies hair strands, increasing resistance to damage while improving overall hair health and flexibility.
Repairing & hydrating treatment: Transform dry, damaged hair with this intensive mask that penetrates deeply, replenishing essential moisture and imparting a healthy, radiant shine.
Long-lasting results & time-saving: Enjoy the benefits of a salon-grade hair mask in the comfort of your own home, with results that last, giving you more time to focus on what matters most.
